column2: "Ɔhen Belsazar too n’ebirɛmpɔn apem pon kɛse
column3: na ɔnoom nsa wɔ hɔn enyim."

column2: "Ber a nsa no baa n’enyi do no
column3: ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa sika na dwetɛ nkɔɔpow a n’egya Nebukadenezar kɛfaa no asɔrdan a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm mu no mbra; ma ɔhen no na n’ebirɛmpɔn
column4: ne yernom na no nwewefo nnom mu."

column2: "Nna wɔdze sika nkɔɔpow a wɔkɛfaa no Nyankopɔn fie asɔrdan a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm mu no bae; na ɔhen no na n’ebirɛmpɔn
column3: ne yernom na no nwewefo no noom mu."

column2: "Wɔnoom nsa
"Dɔn no ara mu na nyimpa nsatseaba puei bae bɛkyerɛɛw ahemfie fasu no ne ban ho wɔ kandzeadua no ne tsentsendo: na ɔhen hun nsa a ɔkyerɛwee no ne fa bi."
"Nna ɔhen no n’enyim danee
column3: na n’adwen haaw no; na n’asen mu akwaa sansanee
column4: na no nkotodwe sesɛɛ ho biribiriw."

column2: "Ɔhen tseaa mu dzendzen dɛ wɔmfa nkaberkyerfo
column4: na sebramufo mbra. Ɔhen no kaa kyerɛɛ Babilɔn enyansafo no dɛ
column8: na oenya sika ntweaban egu no kɔn mu
column9: na ɔayɛ ahenman yi mu tumdzifo a otsia ebiasa."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no n’enyansafo no nyina bae: na woenntum annkenkan kyerɛw no
column3: eso wɔamma ɔhen no ennhu nkyerɛase no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Belsazar no ho guaan no kɛse
column4: na n’ebirɛmpɔn no hɔn enyi bɔe."

column2: "Na osian ɔhen na n’ebirɛmpɔn hɔn kasaa no ntsi
column3: ɔhembaa no baa aponto dan no mu: ɔhembaa no kasae see dɛ
column5: nya nkwa daa; mma w’adwen nnhaw wo

column2: "banyin bi wɔ w’ahenman mu a abosom krɔnkrɔn sunsum wɔ no mu
column5: na nyansa a ɔtse dɛ abosom nyansaa wɔ w’egya nda no mu: na w’egya Nebukadenezar

column2: "osiandɛ wohun sunsum a ɔkyɛn
column6: na nsɛm a no mu yɛ sum mu kyerɛ
column8: wɔ Daniel kor yi ara a ɔhen too no Bɛltesasar no mu. Afei ma wɔnkɛfrɛ Daniel

column2: "Nna wɔdze Daniel baa ɔhen no enyim. Ɔhen no bisaa Daniel dɛ
column3: Ana ɔwo nye Daniel a ifi Juda ndɔmmummba a m’egya dze hɔn fi Juda bae no mu no?"

column2: "Matse wo nka dɛ abosom no sunsum wɔ wo mu
column3: na dɛ woehu kan na ntseasee na nyansa kyɛnee wɔ wo mu."

column2: "Na afei wɔdze enyansafo
column4: aba m’enyim dɛ wɔmbɛkenkan kyerɛw no na wɔmma munhu ne nkyerɛase: na woenntum asɛm no n’ase kyerɛ."

column2: "Na matse wo nka
column4: na esan anyanyan pɔw: afei sɛ itum kenkan kyerɛw no
column5: na ema muhu ne nkyerɛase a
column7: na enya sika ntweaban egu wo kɔn mu
column8: na ayɛ ahenman no tumdzifo a otsia ebiasa."

column2: "Nna Daniel buae see ɔhen no dɛ
column4: na fa w’akatua ma obi; naaso mebɛkenkan kyerɛw no akyerɛ wo

column2: "Ɔwo ɔhen
"na osian tum a ɔdze maa no ntsi
column5: na kasa horow nyina ho popoe na wosuroi wɔ n’enyim: nyia ɔpɛ na okum no
column6: na nyia ɔpɛ na ɔmaa ɔtsenaa ase; na nyia ɔpɛ na ɔmaa no do
column7: na nyia ɔpɛ na ɔbrɛɛ no adze."

column2: "Na n’akoma maa noho do
column3: na no sunsum sorowee ma ɔyɛɛ nkontompɔdze no
column4: wotuu no fii n’ahengua no do
column5: na wɔgyee n’enyimnyam fii ne nsamu:"

column2: "na wɔpaam no fii adasamba mu; na wɔyɛɛ n’adwen dɛ mbowa dze
column3: na ɔnye sar do nsoasopɔnkɔ kɛtsenae; wɔmaa ɔwee efuw dɛ anantwi
column4: na ɔsor bɔsu fɔɔw no honam: kodur dɛ ohun dɛ Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no dzi tum wɔ nyimpa ahendzi mu
column5: na dɛ ɔnoara na ɔdze obiara a ɔpɛ si do."

column2: "Na ɔwo ne ba
"na mbom ama woho do etsia ɔsor Wura; na wɔdze ne fie nkɔɔpow aba w’enyim na ɔwo na w’ebirɛmpɔn
column4: anonom mu nsa; na ɔwo akamfo dwetɛ
column9: na ɔbo abosom a wonnhu adze
column11: na wonnyim no: na Nyankopɔn a w’ahom wɔ ne nsamu
column12: na w’akwan nyina yɛ nedze no dze

column2: "ɔno ntsi na wɔsomaa nsakum no fi n’enyim bae
"Na kyerɛw a wokrukyei no nye: MENE
"Asɛm no ne nkyerɛase nye yi: MENE; Nyankopɔn akan w’ahendzi
"TEKEL; woeker wo wɔ nsɛn mu
column3: na woehu wo dɛ etɔ sin."

column2: "PERES (UPHARSIN); wɔakyɛ w’ahendzi mu na wɔdze ama Mediafo na Persiafo."
"Nna Belsazar hyɛe ma wofuraa Daniel ɔberdum
column3: na wɔdze sika ntweaban guu no kɔn mu
column4: na wɔbɔɔ no ho dawur dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ahendzi no mu tumdzifo a otsia ebiasa."

column2: "Anadwe no ara na wokum Kaldeahen Belsazar."
"Na Medianyi Darius ne nsa kaa ahendzi no
